title: Inscribe Cuts Fraud Review Time by 20x with Claude AI \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Inscribe Cuts Fraud Review Time by 20x with Claude AI \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Learn how Inscribe leverages Claude AI to automate fraud detection and document verification, reducing review time from 30 minutes to 90 seconds while increasing output by 70x.
